name: documentation
comment: OnGive of a toggle means that the key of the existing toggle will change from one to the other

name: age_toggle
comment: OnGive or OnUse of this key, it gets the current state and then swaps it around

name: day_time
comment: For the purposes of this naive logic, being able to dampe grave means reaching to toggle day_time via song
comment2: Gold Skulltula logic might only require night, doesn't care how you get there.
comment3: OnGive or OnUse of this key changes time for night.

name: child
comment: NEVER given directly. Only given from age_toggle

name: adult
comment: NEVER given directly. Only given from age_toggle
